thread.title: WATCH: MS Dhoni wins the Internet again, posts lovely video of him playing with dogs | Zee News
thread.title_full: WATCH: MS Dhoni wins the Internet again, posts lovely video of him playing with dogs | Zee News

title: WATCH: MS Dhoni wins the Internet again, posts lovely video of him playing with dogs | Zee News
text:
Follow @ZeeNewsSports 
New Delhi: While Team India under Virat Kohli is leaving no stones unturned in their preparations to beat the mighty Aussies in the upcoming series, ex-captain MS Dhoni is enjoying his time at home. 
Mahi on Friday posted a video, where he can be seen playing with his dogs using a tennis ball. 
Mahi is known for his love for bikes and dogs and he is getting active on social media in his free time. No matter how much he tries to let go off the feeling of being a captain, even at home he has taken the commanding position. 
A post shared by @mahi7781 on Feb 16, 2017 at 9:48pm PST 
In this Instagram video, he can be seen making his dogs obey to him first before he bounces the ball and tries to trick his dogs. MSD fans will see him back in action in Indian Premier League on April 6 when he will lead Rising Pune Supergiants against Mumbai Indians. 
However, the fans will have to wait till June to see Dhoni back in Indian colours when India will take on their arch-rivals Pakistan in ICC Champions Trophy. First Published: Friday, February 17, 2017 - 15:08 More from zeenews
